name: The Siege (Matt Murch)
description:
Hello, Sir!

We need you to take command of our point defense cannon to save the city!

COMBAT:
You can aim at anything they shoot at us with the LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS. By pressing the UP ARROW you can fire at the huge projectiles.
Remember: We pitiful humans can’t even scratch their hull, our only hope is to destroy whatever their projectiles are!

CITY:
The city has some good shields, but they can only take two hits. After that, you’re almost done for. Watch the six sections of the city to see how close to death you really may be…
